content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Stone Furnace for Iron Smelting with Automated Transfer at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) that processes iron ore and coal to produce iron plates.
- Input Automation Setup:
  • Burner Inserter (position 1.5, 0.5) with pickup position (2.5, 0.5) that draws iron ore from the chest.
  • Wooden Chest (position 3.5, 0.5) holding inventory {'iron-ore': 10}.

### Stone Furnace for Copper Smelting at position(5.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace (position 5.0, 0.0) that processes copper ore and coal to produce copper plates.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Entity Placement and Alignment Conflicts – Repeated failures to position burner inserters and wooden chests were caused by collisions with existing entities and improper offsets. Adjust spacing, direction, or reference positions and verify that the target tile is unoccupied before placement.
• Reconfiguration Overlaps – Successive reconfigurations require complete removal of interfering or residual entities from previous setups to avoid alignment errors.
• Fuel Supply Shortages – Attempts to fuel burner inserters sometimes failed due to insufficient coal. Ensure adequate fuel is available in inventory prior to fueling transfer components.
• Inventory Insertion Control – Insertion failures occur when the required resources are not available. Confirm inventory contents before inserting items.
